Christian Kohlschuetter wrote:

> On Thursday 17 February 2005 19:06, stack wrote:
> > > I managed to solve the speed decrease, but I am not sure if it's much
> > > slower
> > > than you would expect. What would be the expected processing speed of
> > > a broad
> > > crawl on a decent machine? Do you have benchmarks?
> >
> > What did you change Christian?
> >...
> It's a mixture of my additions (submitted patches, especially the
> ThreadLocalConnectionManager) and the simple fact that I now use the
> CachedBdbBigMap class instead of HashMap... Folks, the importance of the
> BigMapFactory property should be mentioned in the docs! :-)

Will do.   After we finish testing and have something to say about its 
effect.
Thanks Christian.
St.Ack
